text: ۞فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَخۡرِجُوٓاْ ءَالَ لُوطٖ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ أُنَاسٞ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ

translation.en: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure
translation.id: Jawaban kaumnya tidak lain hanya dengan mengatakan, "Usirlah Luṭ dan keluarganya dari negerimu; sesungguhnya mereka adalah orang-orang yang (menganggap dirinya) suci
